name: .RLF File Extension
summary: Learn about .RLF files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Report template created by ArcGIS Desktop geospatial visualization and analysis software; stores the layout for a report and includes template fields and source data information; used for generating geospatial reports (.RDF files).

content: RLF files are created with the Report Designer included with ArcGIS Desktop.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
